name: India Foundation for Humanistic Development
briefDescription: India Foundation for Humanistic Development [IFHD] is a Sec 25 (now 8) not-for-profit foundation with pan India operations. Guided by humanist values, IFHDâ€™s vision is to rejuvenate productive landscapes equitably and sustainably.IFHD is promoted by senior professionals, with in-depth experience in international development organizations. IFHD is governed by a Board comprising reputed professionals from the agriculture, law and corporate sector. IFHD staff have a collective experience in social, entrepreneurial and private sectors and skill sets covering agriculture, food, retail, financial, skill development and speak multiple Indian languages.  IFHD has specific expertise in the promotion of Farmer Producer Organizations (FPOs).
